GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

POST /api/topics.description: Accepts a topic object with a slug and description, and serves the posted topic.

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles. Accepts topic query, which serves an array of all articles with the specified topic. Accepts sort_by query, which serves an array of all articles sorted by specified column, defaults to created_at. Accepts order query, which serves an array of all articles ordered, defaults to desc. Accepts limit query, which limits the response to specified number of articles, defaults to 10. Also accepts page query 'p', which specifies the page at which to start, defaults to the first page.

POST /api/articles.description: Accepts an article object, and serves the posted article with a comment count. The author and topic must exist. article_img_url will default if not provided

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object that contains the specified user

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object that contains the specified article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments on a specified article. Accepts limit query, which limits the response to specified number of comments, and defaults to 10. Also accepts page query 'p', which specifies the page at which to start, defaults to the first page.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Accepts a comment object with a username and body, and serves the posted comment. The user must exist.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Accepts a votes increment object, and serves the article with the updated votes.
